I would find another way to express my creativity.
i am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree.

participant_2.background:
I remember my dad taking me fishing in the pond on his property.
i take everything literally.
I am into parkour because it is a great way to stay in shape and it is also a lot of fun.
i have a sleeve of tattoos.
I go to the desert a lot, but I'm not as happy with my weight as I could be.

content.text: Hey! How was your day?
It was okay. I went to the desert to do some parkour.
That sounds fun! I've never been to the desert.
You should go! It's a lot of fun and it's a great place to get exercise.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You'd really like it.
What's your favorite part about the desert?
I love the freedom. There's so much space to move around and you can see for miles.
That sounds amazing. I'm a little jealous.
You should come with me sometime.
I'd love to!
Great! We'll have to plan a trip soon.
Sounds good.
Do you like to do anything else besides parkour?
I do! I like to cook and I'm studying to be a vet.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to make?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm really good at making homemade pasta.
That sounds delicious! I've never made homemade pasta before.
You should try it! It's really easy and it's so much better than store-bought pasta.
I'll have to give it a try.
You won't regret it
